00001 proc find_package_helper {dname pkg} {
00002   
00003   # If we can find a pkgIndex.tcl file in the dname directory
00004   # see if it calls an ifneeded for the given package.
00005   if {[file exists [set pkg_index [file join $dname pkgIndex.tcl]]]} {
00006     if {![catch { open $pkg_index r } rc]} {
00007       foreach line [split [read $rc] \n] {
00008         if {[regexp "^\\s*package\\s+ifneeded\\s+$pkg" $line]} {
00009           lappend ::new_auto_path $dname
00010           close $rc
00011           return 1
00012         }
00013       }
00014       close $rc
00015     }
00016   }
00017   
00018   # Continue to search in subdirectories
00019   foreach sdname [glob -nocomplain -directory $dname -types d *] {
00020     if {[find_package_helper $sdname $pkg]} {
00021       return 1
00022     }
00023   }
00024   
00025   return 0
00026   
00027 }
00028 
00029 proc find_package {pkg} {
00030   
00031   foreach dname $::auto_path {
00032     if {[find_package_helper $dname $pkg]} {
00033       return 1
00034     }
00035   }
00036   
00037   return 0
00038   
00039 }
00040 
00041 set new_auto_path $auto_path
00042 
00043 foreach pkg [list Tclx] {
00044   if {![find_package $pkg]} {
00045     error "Unable to find package $pkg in auto_path"
00046   }
00047 }
00048 
00049 puts "A auto_path: $auto_path"
00050 set auto_path $new_auto_path
00051 puts "B auto_path: $auto_path"
00052 
00053 puts "This is good"
